message.body: Well!!!! Miss you . Thinking of you . Are loving it? Are you having fun? Are you working hard? We miss your aura around.!!! Hugs, Susan
Hey Susan!!!! Miss you too! How are things at church? I'm having lots of fun but so far it's a ton of work!

I'm good. Church is being renovated. No place for much. SS will be late and not sure where we'll be. You sound good..sound happy. Great. Dom't be afraid of hard work. You do what you can. You're smart and sharp and handsome. Make good friends. TAlk soon. Love
